overview: A small village in the centre of Portugal saw many of its inhabitants emigrate in the 60s and 70s. Many of them came back to "die at home", while others didn’t manage to do so, such as my parents. I go to the village and I visit the places where they were born, lived and died. I try to remake memories. I wonder whether my parents would live as all those who managed to return
title: O Regresso
